definition: to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-inflammatory and analgesic effects of Aralia echinocaulis Foot bark.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨刺茎楤木根皮的抗炎镇痛作用。

sentences.english: It seems likely that this protein will attract a great deal more analgesic research.
sentences.chinese: 这种蛋白质可能会引发更多的镇痛剂研究。

sentences.english: Difluorobiphenyl is the key intermediate for the synthesis of antipyretic analgesic Diflunisal.
sentences.chinese: 二氟联苯是合成消炎镇痛药氟苯水杨酸的关键中间体。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To explore the effects of Erjintang on analgesic effect and gastrointestinal motility.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨二金汤方的镇痛作用和对胃肠运动的影响。

sentences.english: The third part, anti-inflammatory and analgesic effect study of PYJC.
sentences.chinese: 第三节，盆炎净胶囊的抗炎与镇痛作用研究。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the utilization of narcotic analgesics in our hospital.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解我院门诊麻醉性镇痛药的使用情况。

sentences.english: Objection To observe analgesic effect of Angelica oil on mouse dysmenorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察研究当归油对小鼠痛经的镇痛作用。

sentences.english: An ice bag or hot water bottle applied to the back many also help to ease the pain.
sentences.chinese: 许多也帮助镇痛的冰袋或热水袋适用于后面。

sentences.english: ConclusionGu Gou Teng solution has significant effects of analgesia and anti-inflammatory on experimental mice.
sentences.chinese: 结论古钩藤水煎剂有明显的镇痛和抗炎作用。

sentences.english: It has several activities, such as antiinflammatory, antibiosis , antitumor and so on.
sentences.chinese: 该植物具有消炎，镇痛，抗菌，抗肿瘤等多种活性。

sentences.english: Analgesic Effects of Gabapentin after Spinal Surgery.
sentences.chinese: 脊髓手术后卡巴贲丁的镇痛作用。

sentences.english: Objective To study the analgesia in advanced cancer with Ms contin and its toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究美施康定对晚期癌症的镇痛效果及副作用。

sentences.english: For example, Dang Gui is found in balms to help with burns and such.
sentences.chinese: 例如，烧伤等所用的镇痛软膏中就含有当归。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the effective analgesic means to anorectal diseases after operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肛肠疾病术后有效镇痛的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the analgesic effect of Mushao mixture.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究牡芍合剂的镇痛效果。

sentences.english: Objective Compare N2O with disoprofol in analgesic of artificial abortion operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较笑气与异丙酚在人流术中的镇痛效果。
